name: Mozzarella and Tomato Appetizer Tray
author: MOLSON7
summary: I had to make something for a work function, so I created this simple platter of mozzarella and tomato slices topped with roasted red peppers and an herb mixture. Serve chilled with toothpicks or bread slices. Omit the capers or add black olives as desired.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and julienned
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together parsley, basil, oregano, capers, garlic and olive oil
On a serving platter, arrange mozzarella cheese slices and tomato slices in alternating layers
Drizzle with the herb and olive oil mixture
Cover and chill in the refrigerator 30 minutes before sprinkling with crushed red pepper and serving
